paper_abstract: The main purpose of this paper is to solve the functional equation T + lambda S = Min + lambda Max, for 0 <= lambda <= infinity and a pair (T, S) of a t-norm T and a t-conorm S. This equation arises when we consider a convex linear combination of a t-norm and a t-conorm, and set out the problem of finding the intersection of the segments determined by the pairs (Min, Max) and (T, S). (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Convex linear T-S functions: A generalization of Frank's equation
